Title: Sankofa Radio
Description: Sankofa is an akan word that literally means "Go back and fetch it". It is an African wise saying that symbolizes learning from the past to build the future. A subsidiary of Sankofa Media Group, Sankofa Radio seeks to cater for the evolving needs of our listeners and the changing landscape of the media market. We will engage in stimulating and thought provoking conversations on issues affecting our community. (Tunein) Broadcasting in akan language
